mapper.select: SELECT resve_num, mem_num, r_num, resve_date, resve_memCnt, resve_chk, resve_sttus, resve_name, resve_phoneNum FROM( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS rn, resve_num, mem_num, r_num, resve_date, resve_memCnt, resve_chk, resve_sttus, resve_name, resve_phoneNum FROM eatstamp.resve, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE r_num = #{r_num} ORDER BY resve_date DESC ) t1 WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM eatstamp.resve resve JOIN eatstamp.rest rest ON resve.r_num = rest.r_num JOIN eatstamp.member member ON rest.r_name = member.mem_nick WHERE member.mem_nick = #{mem_nick}
